The dress is flattering and true to size, though opinions about the fabric quality are mixed, with some finding it nice while one customer describes it as cheap. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth buying ❤️
items.body: Cuuuuute. Flirty and flattering. I purchased this for a date night and wore it with suede knee high boots and a matching handbag. It’s the perfect balance of sexy without being immodest. Additionally, the material is stretchy and comfortable, but not very warm despite the long sleeves as they are mesh. But don’t let that deter you from buying the dress! A cute jacket or vest will fix that. Also if you have bigger hips and glutes this dress will be more of a mini dress so that is something to be mindful of. I bought my normal size and I’m very happy with my purchase overall. Read more
items.author: BoyMom2

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So so cute LOVE this dress
items.body: Wore this to a surprise party of about 40 ppl and I think everyone there complimented me on the dress atleast 2x. So flattering and so so comfortable. Theres a slip on the inside so not see through at all but the sleeves are sheer and so adorable. I’m 5’3 125 lbs and got a small and it fit so well not too short. Love it Read more
items.author: Kassidy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars so cute and comfy
items.body: love this thang! so cute and comfortable. fits well and true to size. get many compliments while wearing :) Read more
items.author: P. T.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Curvy/Girls with booty beware!
items.body: I am 5ft 4in tall, weigh 209 pounds and am curvy. I purchased a medium. It fits just fine but wow! If you have even the slightest thigh and butt, you will be wearing this as a shirt. I’m not sure if I want to return yet because it’s still cute asa shirt but the only way I could see myself wearing it as a dress is if I were to buy like maybe an XXL and then it’d actually be a mini dress. Right now, the bottom sliver of my butt cheeks hangs out. So… I mean ..? lol also I do feel it’s slightly different than the picture the way the material presents. I got the red one. Read more
items.author: Darnisha

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute going dress!
items.body: Loved the dress! Taking off one star since its a bit longer than depicted (may just be a me problem). Fabric was breathable enough that I didn't feel too hot in a crowded bar. The material has a black lining for the torso portion into the skirt, but the sleeves are not lined. Read more
items.author: Hien Nguyen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
items.body: Must have in your closet! I ordered a small. I’m 5’5 - 150lbs. Nice dress for date night Read more
items.author: Nancy Ruiz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy, comfortable, great fit!
items.body: This aught to rev his engine. Short, slinky, sexy. Pairing this sex kitten dress with some high heel, over the knee boots That look says "Come n get it!" Read more
items.author: Psychomaven

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Room to Breathe
items.body: Very cute dress, good material, not see-through. True to size - plenty of room to breathe Read more
items.author: Cailyn H

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: All Red, Brown and Grey, All Rust Brown, Brown Multi, All Grey, Pink, All Brown, Dark Black, Purple, Brown and Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
